Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: PolicyVault Phase 1 MVP

Cybersecurity Policy Management Platform featuring:
- Next.js 16 full-stack with TypeScript
- PostgreSQL database with 11 migration files
- NextAuth.js authentication with JWT sessions
- Policy lifecycle management \(Draft → Review → Finalized → Archived\)
- Document upload with DOCX/PDF text extraction
- NIST CSF 2.0 framework with 106 controls and 62 best practices
- AI-powered compliance analysis using Claude API
- Gap analysis and remediation recommendations
- PDF and CSV report export
- Notifications system
- Audit logging

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
